            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_columnControl_1">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_columnControlColumn_1" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="internal-column-0_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can buy and sell Wayfoong Statement Gold directly with your HSBC Global Private Banking, HSBC Premier Elite, HSBC Premier, HSBC One or Personal Integrated Account. You don't need any special accounts to do so.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you don't have one of those accounts, you can open a standalone Wayfoong Statement Gold Account at an HSBC branch. Please note that the Wayfoong Statement Gold Account is a non-interest bearing account.</p>

<div id="content_columnControl_2">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_columnControlColumn_2" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="internal-column-0_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There are no handling charges besides the actual buying or selling price at the time of the transaction. Any fees and charges incurred by HSBC are contained and included in our sell and buy price calculations.</p>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1645523550__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1645523550__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I profit from investing in Wayfoong Statement Gold? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1645523550__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_columnControl_3">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_columnControlColumn_3" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="internal-column-0_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Here's an example from Section 4 (Scenario analysis) in the product factsheet:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Let's assume that the price of Loco London Gold increases, resulting in a gain scenario. Let's also assume that you bought 10 units of the product at HKD1,600 per unit.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After the price of Loco London Gold increases, you sell all your units at HKD1,800 per unit. That means you make a profit of HKD2,000 in realised profit:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(HKD1,800 – HKD1,600) x 10 units = HKD2,000</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="internal-column-0_richtext_4" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL">Remarks: The hypothetical example is for illustrative purposes only. It do not reflect a complete analysis of all possible potential gain or loss scenarios and must not be relied on as an indication of the actual performance of the Product. You should not rely on these examples when making an investment decision.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL">Investment involves risk. The price of gold is volatile and customers should recognise that value of their investment may go down as well as up. Wayfoong Statement Gold is not principal protected and have the possible loss of principal invested. It is also not insured by any governmental agency. Wayfoong Statement Gold does not represent a deposit of money and provides no yield nor interest. Investment in Wayfoong Statement Gold is not the same as investment in physical gold. Price changes in physical gold might not be reflected in price changes of Wayfoong Statement Gold.</p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL">The information shown in this website is neither a recommendation, an offer, nor a solicitation for any investment product or service. Past performance is no guide to future performance. Investors should refer to the individual product explanatory memorandum or offering document for further details and risks involved.</p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL">The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited is the issuer and product arranger of Wayfoong Statement Gold. The Securities and Futures Commission (the 'SFC') has authorised the Wayfoong Statement Gold and offering documents of Wayfoong Statement Gold. The SFC's authorisation does not imply official recommendation or endorsement of Wayfoong Statement Gold, nor does it guarantee the commercial merits of Wayfoong Statement Gold or its performance. It does not mean Wayfoong Statement Gold is suitable for all investors nor is it an endorsement of its suitability for any particular investor or class of investors.</p> 
<p class="A-TYPSP-RW-ALL">The information contained in this website have not been reviewed by the Securities and Futures Commission of Hong Kong or any regulatory authority in Hong Kong.<br> </p>
